definitions.definition: Any of the animals belonging to the clade Dinosauria , especially those that existed during the Triassic , Jurassic and Cretaceous periods and are now extinct .
Any member of the clade Dinosauria other than birds .
Any extinct reptile , not necessarily belonging to Dinosauria, that existed between about 230 million and 65 million years ago, as well as the stem-mammal Dimetrodon .
Something or someone that is very old or old-fashioned, or is not willing to change and adapt.
Anything no longer in common use or practice.

main_definition: ( sciences ) Any of the animals belonging to the clade Dinosauria , especially those that existed during the Triassic , Jurassic and Cretaceous periods and are now extinct . [from c . 1840]
secondary_definitions: ( colloquial ) Any member of the clade Dinosauria other than birds .
( proscribed ) Any extinct reptile , not necessarily belonging to Dinosauria, that existed between about 230 million and 65 million years ago, as well as the stem-mammal Dimetrodon .
( figuratively , colloquial ) Something or someone that is very old or old-fashioned, or is not willing to change and adapt.
( figuratively , colloquial ) Anything no longer in common use or practice.
